A B C D E F G H I J K M N P R S T U V W

A

addPoint(byte[], short, short) - Method in interface com.nxp.id.jcopx.ECPoint
Adds the operand in buffer to the operand in field W of the ECPoint object.
ALG_AES_CMAC16 - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.SignatureX
Signature algorithm ALG_AES_CMAC16 generates an 16-byte MAC using a 2-key DES3 key according to CMAC algorithm NIST SP_800-38B
ALG_DES_CMAC8 - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.SignatureX
Signature algorithm ALG_DES_CMAC8 generates an 8-byte MAC using a 2-key DES3 key according to CMAC algorithm NIST SP_800-38B
ALG_DES_MAC8_ISO9797_1_M1_ALG3 - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.SignatureX
Signature algorithm ALG_DES_MAC8_ISO9797_1_M1_ALG3 generates an 8-byte MAC using a 2-key DES3 key according to ISO9797-1 MAC algorithm 3 with method 1 (also EMV'96, EMV'2000), where input data is padded using method 1 and the data is processed as described in MAC Algorithm 3 of the ISO 9797-1 specification.
ALG_DH - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.KeyAgreementX
KeyAgreement algorithm ALG_DH performs modular exponentiation with the exponent and modulus provided by the PrivateKey.
ALG_EC_SVDP_DH_PLAIN_XY - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.KeyAgreementX
KeyAgreement algorithm ALG_EC_SVDP_DH_PLAIN_XY is the same as ALG_EC_SVDP_DH_PLAIN but but with additional Y component and a leading 0x04, which is the format of an uncompressed point.
ALG_ECDSA_PLAIN - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.SignatureX
Signature algorithm signs/verifies the message without hashing using ECDSA.
ALG_KOREAN_SEED_CBC_FPAD - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.CipherX
Cipher algorithm ALG_KOREAN_SEED_CBC_FPAD provides a cipher using the Korean SEED algorithm specified in the Korean SEED Algorithm specification provided by KISA, Korea Information Security Agency in ECB mode .
ALG_KOREAN_SEED_CBC_NRPAD - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.CipherX
Cipher algorithm ALG_KOREAN_SEED_CBC_NRPAD provides a cipher using the Korean SEED algorithm specified in the Korean SEED Algorithm specification provided by KISA, Korea Information Security Agency in ECB mode.
ALG_KOREAN_SEED_ECB_FPAD - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.CipherX
Cipher algorithm ALG_KOREAN_SEED_ECB_FPAD provides a cipher using the Korean SEED algorithm specified in the Korean SEED Algorithm specification provided by KISA, Korea Information Security Agency in ECB mode.
ALG_KOREAN_SEED_ECB_NRPAD - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.CipherX
Cipher algorithm ALG_KOREAN_SEED_ECB_NRPAD provides a cipher using the Korean SEED algorithm specified in the Korean SEED Algorithm specification provided by KISA, Korea Information Security Agency in ECB mode.
ALG_KOREAN_SEED_MAC_FPAD - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.SignatureX
Signature algorithm ALG_KOREAN_SEED_MAC_NOPAD generates an 16-byte MAC using Korean SEED in CBC mode.
ALG_KOREAN_SEED_MAC_NRPAD - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.SignatureX
Signature algorithm ALG_KOREAN_SEED_MAC_NRPAD generates an 16-byte MAC using Korean SEED in CBC mode.
ALG_RSA_CRT_X - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.KeyPairX
KeyPair object containing a secure RSA key pair with private key in its Chinese Remainder Theorem form.
ALG_RSA_SHA_256_ISO9796 - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.SignatureX
Signature algorithm ALG_RSA_SHA_256_ISO9796 generates a 32-byte SHA digest, pads the digest according to the ISO 9796-2 scheme as specified in EMV '96 and EMV 2000, and encrypts it using RSA.
ALG_RSA_X - Static variable in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.KeyPairX
KeyPair object containing a secure RSA key pair.
ARRAY_IS_NOT_MAPABLE - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.SecureBoxException
The array handed over to runNativeLib is not located in EEPROM area
ARRAY_REFERENCE_INVALID - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.IOConfigException
An invalid reference value for the array has been used.
arrayCalcEDC(byte[], short, short) - Static method in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.UtilX
Calculates a checksum across the specified part out of src array and stores the result in src array at position srcOff+length.
arrayCopyNonAtomicVerifyEDC(byte[], short, byte[], short, short) - Static method in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.UtilX
Copies an array, including the checksum, from the specified source array, beginning at the specified position, to the specified position of the destination array (non-atomically) and performs a checksum verification.
arrayVerifyEDC(byte[], short, short) - Static method in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.UtilX
Verifies if one EDC (Error Detection Code) value out of a byte array is valid.
